alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 5:53PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northwestern Palm Beach County through 630 PM EST... At 553 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Pahokee to near Clewiston. Movement was east at 35 to 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pahokee, Canal Point, and Fremd Village-Padgett Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.
